statements.statement:
select * from TM_GPB_KETQUA where LOAIGPB_ID = (select DICTIONARY_ID from LST_DICTIONARY where DICTIONARY_CODE = '$DICTIONARY_CODE$' and ROWNUM = 1)
IDX is not null
IDX is null
and CAP = 1 and TAMNGUNG = 0
select * from TM_GPB_KETQUA where CAPTREN_ID = (select GPB_KETQUA_ID from TM_GPB_KETQUA where MA = '$MA$') and CAP = 2 and TAMNGUNG = 0 and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
select * from TM_GPB_KETQUA where GPB_KETQUA_ID = '$GPB_KETQUA_ID$' and TAMNGUNG = 0 and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

select m.*, d.SID from TT_QUANLYBENHPHAM m inner join TT_QUANLYBENHPHAM_CHITIET d on m.QUANLYBENHPHAM_ID = d.QUANLYBENHPHAM_ID where d.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$' and m.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
